title: Trouble Generating Font Files
content:
I'm having trouble generating my (Windows Truetype) font files.   
When I hit GENERATE FILES fontographer crashes with the error message ,"This program has Performed an illegal operation and will be shut down blah, blah, blibidy, blah...". This problem seemed to coincide with me pasting A-Z to a-z... but I'm very new to this software... I'm really stuck, would someone lend a hand?   
\_craig   
P.S. Here are my system specs: PC, Win 98, Fontographer V 4.1
author: butterworth

comments.content: Reinstall your FOG.if don´t work, reinstall your win
